entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Saugeen Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 6:16 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
